column5: There is an amber alert in Sudbury as a new born baby has been abducted. For more info go to  Amber Alert. They have a picture posted. Sad news.
Bewildering...hopefully it was a REALLY healthy newborn to survive this ordeal.
very scary indeed, got searched on my way home, hope they find the baby soon and in good health
Ch 230 of Bell Expressvu also has a picture posted of the abductor. If anyone can help, please do.

same as Walleyejigger took me a little while longer to get home from Sudbury..OPP & Greater Sudbury Police are thoroughly checkin' vehicles...  people like her aren't right in the head.... hope they find the little girl soon..  prayers go out to the family.

wow very sad and scary.  After having 2 children the past couple of years, I can't understand how this could happen.  The babies NEVER left my wife's side, but more importantly, I had to practically give DNA just to get in to see mom/baby.  Strangers could not just walk in to the maternity ward.

Apparently she was wearing clothes similar to staff, she told the mother she had to take the baby to get weighed,and I guess they figured she was a nurse. This is just hearsay though. They got a good pic and video so hopefully this will have a good outcome.
Hearing word she has been found in Kirkland Lake. I'm hoping so.
Confirmed, baby is well, news report just came on.
great news.  The woman who took the baby walks away with probation probably or a brief stint in a psychiatric facility.  What a world we live in.
